main_menu.title: UL INDUSTRIAL RELAY BOARD SOLUTIONS
main_menu.description: UL relay boards are designed for reliable signal switching and load control in industrial automation systems, control panels, and machine interfaces. These boards provide safe electrical isolation between control circuits and high-power loads, ensuring stable system operation and equipment protection. Their rugged construction, organized terminal layout, and industrial-grade components make them ideal for PLC interfacing, motor control circuits, and automated machinery applications.
features: Optical and electrical isolation for safety
Clear LED status indicators for diagnostics

menu_drop1.name: 8 Channel Relay Board
menu_drop1.description: The UL 8 Channel Relay Board is engineered to control multiple electrical loads simultaneously while maintaining strong isolation between control and power circuits. It is widely used in PLC control panels, automation systems, and industrial machines for switching motors, solenoids, lamps, and other electrical equipment. Its compact design, integrated protection circuits, and clear status LEDs ensure easy monitoring and long-term reliable operation in harsh environments.

menu_drop2.name: 16 Channel Relay Board
menu_drop2.description: The UL 16 Channel Relay Board offers high-density switching capability for complex automation systems requiring multiple output controls in a single module. It is commonly deployed in large PLC cabinets, industrial automation lines, and machine control systems to manage various electrical loads efficiently. With robust isolation, strong relay contacts, and organized wiring terminals, it ensures safe, stable, and long-term industrial operation.

main_menu2.title: UL REDUNDANCY MODULE SOLUTIONS
main_menu2.description: UL redundancy modules ensure uninterrupted power supply to critical automation systems by managing dual power sources with intelligent load sharing and failover switching. These modules are essential in applications where downtime is unacceptable, such as industrial control systems, manufacturing plants, and infrastructure automation. They automatically switch power sources during failures while maintaining stable voltage output to connected equipment.
features: Load sharing between dual power supplies

menu_drop2_1.name: 8 Channel Redundancy Module
menu_drop2_1.description: The UL 8 Channel Redundancy Module is built to manage multiple power outputs while maintaining uninterrupted supply through intelligent power source monitoring. It ensures continuous operation of PLC systems, sensors, and automation equipment even during power supply failure. Its industrial-grade construction and real-time fault detection make it ideal for critical automation installations requiring high reliability.

menu_drop2_2.name: 16 Channel Redundancy Module
menu_drop2_2.description: The UL 16 Channel Redundancy Module is designed for large-scale automation systems where multiple devices require continuous power availability. It offers enhanced load distribution, rapid source switching, and advanced protection mechanisms to safeguard sensitive industrial equipment. This module is widely used in complex control panels and process automation systems for maximum system uptime.
